scripts.export: next export && touch out/.nojekyll && touch out/CNAME && echo "blog.krawaller.se" >> out/CNAME && cp rss.xml out/rss.xml && cp README_pub.md out/README.md
scripts.publish: cd out && rm -rf .git && git init && git add . && git commit -m 'publish' && git remote add origin git@github.com:krawaller/krawaller.github.io.git && git push -f origin master
scripts.robot: npm run makePosts && rm -rf out && npm run build && npm run export && npm run publish
